chapters.title: Chapter 27: The Practice of Diffdence
chapters.info: Lord Agelmar Jagad, p. 469 (333)—Lord of Fal Dara, and commander of the King's army in Shienar. He is one of the best military commanders in the World, in such company as Davram Bashere, Gareth Bryne, Pedron Niall, and Rodel Ituralde.
